Author: hhm
Title: The fall of Ion Storm: the story of a game startup that did almost everything wrong

Author: andreyf
Content:
The article says: The "list" is reportedly the product of a Q4 project in which all group heads were asked to look at redundancies and create their own lists of potential cuts. All the group-level lists have now been turned in to corporate.

There is a lot of dead wood, and even more VP level employees that really don't contribute to the bottom line.

It doesn't sound like this is how you get rid of VP-level dead wood, or am I wrong?

Author: terpua
Content: If you need multiple user access for accounting, I recommend Less Accounting - think Quickbooks but online.

Author: oudeis
Title: RSS feed is broken, and submission form is sometimes broken
Content:
I could not find a link to support, so submitting it here. There are 2 problems with the site:

1. Links in RSS feed are broken; they look like http://news.ycombinator.comitem/?id=101517 instead of the correct http://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=101517

2. Submission form is missing the text field if you get to access it through news.ycombinator.com/x instead of news.ycombinator.com/submit (this happens when you are redirected to submission form after login)

Cheers

Author: hhm
Content: If you use Flex, it's free too (not open, though).
